relevantArticles.articleAbstractText: CPU:R5 2500U GPU:核显 ## /etc/portage/make.conf # These settings were set by the catalyst build script that automatically # built this stage. # Please consult /usr/share/portage/config/make.conf.example for a more # detailed example. COMMON_FLAGS="-march=native -O2 -pipe" CFLAGS="${COMMON_FLAGS}" CXXFLAGS="${COMMON_FLAGS}" FCFLAGS="${COMMON_FLAGS}" FFLAGS="${COMMON_FLAGS}" MAKEOPTS="-j3" VIDEO_CARDS="amdgpu radeonsi" INPUT_DEVICES="evdev synaptics" L10N="en-US zh-CN en zh" LANGUAS="en-US zh_CN en ....

备份以快速恢复 1. 内核配置文件: /usr/src/linux/.config ## 方便重新配置内核 2. 文件安装配置: /etc/portage/make.conf以及 /etc/portage/package.* ## 方便配置USE flag 3. 已安装文件列表: /var/lib/portage/world ##方便emerge -avuDN world 4. X的配置文件: /etc/X11/xorg.conf ##方便配置鼠标，显示器 5. 磁盘挂载配置文件: /etc/fstab ##挂载 6. grub启动配置文件: /boot/grub/grub.cfg ##分区启动 7. ~/bashrc, ~/.xinitrc .... 8.二进制包;/var/cache/binpkgs/ #XAPK Or GAPK 9.源文件: /var/cache/distfiles/
